title: Introducing GPT-5: Our Most Capable Model Yet
summary: Today we're releasing GPT-5, which achieves state-of-the-art results across multiple benchmarks including 95% on SWE-bench Verified, 89% on MMLU, and 94% on HumanEval.
author: OpenAI Team

title: Scaling to 10^27 FLOPs: Lessons from Our Largest Training Run
summary: We share insights from training our largest model to date, using 10^27 FLOPs of compute. This represents a 10x scale-up from our previous generation.
author: OpenAI Research
